mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EVENT ORDER BY EVENTNUM DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT (EVENTSUB, EVENTDATESTA, EVENTDATEEND, EVENTCONTENT) VALUES (#{eventsub},#{eventdateSta},#{eventdateEnd},#{eventcontent})
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET EVENTSUB=#{eventsub}, EVENTDATESTA=#{eventdateSta}, EVENTDATEEND=#{eventdateEnd},EVENTCONTENT=#{eventcontent} WHERE EVENTNUM=#{eventnum}
